Source.Name: libflac
Source.Summary: Encoder/decoder for the Free Lossless Audio Codec
Source.Description: FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec, an audio format similar to MP3, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.

Package.Name: libflac
Package.Summary: Encoder/decoder for the Free Lossless Audio Codec
Package.Description: FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec, an audio format similar to MP3, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.
